ai-tika-s0402t7:1_1: the third rains residence is dropped on the part of the robe, and the signs have been stored, he says, “What reason have you hid?”
ai-tika-s0402t7:1_2: Second: Aspirations consisting in the second, etc.
ai-tika-s0402t7:1_3: Likewise: it is not possible to show the same place as the origin of sensual pleasures, etc., that is to say, sense desires as giving,
ai-tika-s0402t7:1_4: For the sake of its fruit: here is the cause, source, condition, and conditioned by these fruits, it becomes the reason why ‘This is a cause,’ and conditioned phenomenon’.
ai-tika-s0402t7:2_0: Seven on borders, beings together by grief and lamentation,
ai-tika-s0402t7:3_1: These ten ways of performing, is conditioned by what is reckoned as object.
ai-tika-s0402t7:3_2: when they are given up, they do not give up.
ai-tika-s0402t7:3_3: In regard to this, they must be told, “Even.”
ai-tika-s0402t7:3_4: As they were taught, they expert independent of this discourse.
ai-tika-s0402t7:4_0: The commentary on the signs of the private parts is finished.
